about_the_game:
Game functions

This trial version contains only a portion of the story line for your experience only.
Japanese text adventure game
Multiple ending routes
Thrilling story

Hints

This is a version for all ages, and I've already taken care of some in-game content that could cause psychological discomfort in players, so please don't worry.
This game uses VOICEVOX for the voices of the characters.

Background

The game begins on 1. September 2012 AD, the single opening day of the school year in China.

Characters appearing


Name: Wan Jie
Nickname: School Boss
CV：VOICEVOX:青山龍星(CV:みみっく=わんだぁぼっくす)

The newly appointed boss of Hanlin School has a special family background and has his own camp in Hanlin School, which aims to overthrow the management of Hanlin School.
But there seems to be something else behind his behavior...


Name: Rongshan
Nickname: Trash can
CV：VOICEVOX:満別花丸

Due to an accident, she was forced to abandon her human dignity and become the "garbage bin" of the Hanlin School.
After meeting another idiot, her world changes...


Name: Chen Xueli
Nickname: Stupid Radio Girl
CV：VOICEVOX:ナースロボ＿タイプＴなど

Search with your own senses for the true Holy Son. Sign a contract with God and realize the desires of their hearts.
In the eyes of others, she is just a stupid and boring girl, a girl who revels in her own delusional world...


Name: Tan Huiwen
Nickname: Future Little Teacher
CV：VOICEVOX:小夜/SAYO

She was accepted as a model student at Hanlin School, but instead of going to the legendary academic class, she chose the ordinary class 10.
To find out the truth, she had to deal with the management of Hanlin School...


Name: Zhou Junli
Nickname: Messenger with a Mission
CV：VOICEVOX:四国めたん

Blood curse, you can't change that...
Revenge on the world has become the only meaning of her existence...


Name: Li Xiaoli
Nickname: Psychologist
CV：VOICEVOX:冥鳴 ひまり

It was no coincidence that she took the job as a psychologist...
It was a secret to which she always knew the answer, but which she could not reveal...


Name: Wu Wanda
Nickname: Xiao Zhengtai
CV：VOICEVOX:白上虎太郎(CV:可愛ユウ)

He and Mianhao have known each other since their time at Hanlin School Junior High School, and they have always played with each other regularly.
When he came to high school, he said, "I am actually a true Holy Son" to get closer to the girl of his dreams...


Name: Xie Cuiru
Nickname: School Idol
CV：VOICEVOX:あいえるたん

"All I've done is get rid of my sins!"
"All I have done is prove that I have no sins!"
"Will you believe me?"
A little joke leads to an irreparable tragedy, and so secrets arise...

Prehistory History

A young man named Mian Hao believes that he is the Holy Son who will save the world. He believes that this is his birthright, but in the eyes of outsiders, he is just a teenager immersed in his own delusional world. During his time at Junior High School, Mianhao meets Wu Wanda, after which the two advance together to Senior High School at Hanlin School.
He can't even imagine what impact life in high school will have on his world of thought...

The scripts, art works, and music works included in the game are all independently created by game developer Cai Chenglong.
Do not use the game content for any commercial or non-commercial purposes without the consent of the owner.
Thank you for your understanding and support!!!
name: Prelude to Nuss Jump Demo

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Storage: 4 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system

short_description: Do you remember the story of the Wise Man from the East? This is a demo only and contains some content.
